name: A.R.S.O.N
description:
Aimlessly Running Sam Obviously Nervous

Lost in a maze, help Sam save 6 of his buddies in 60 seconds. Maze is generated randomly each time.

Controls
WASD - Move
Shift - Run
Mouse - Camera
Space - Jump

Tip: Use jump to look over fences

Game was created for https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-89

Big thanks to Elias James for saving me with great audio. More here: https://www.behance.net/gallery/49177159/CompositionFilm-Scoring-Demos

Game was built in about 5 hours using free assets so credit where it's due:
Maze Generator: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/modeling/maze-generator-38689
Toon Characters: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/toony-tiny-ww1-soldiers-demo-115694
Fire: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/essentials/tutorial-projects/unity-particle-pack-127325
